message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects our positions in this game.
I think we should split it closer to 50/50, considering the inflation that will occur in future rounds.
I understand your point about a 50/50 split, Bob, but I initiated the negotiation. This offer reflects the time pressure.
Considering the significant inflation in just three rounds, I believe this split is more than fair. Future rounds will only decrease the value further.
Bob, it's clear we both want a larger share, but the inflation is eating away at the value. Let's end this now with a fair 50/50 split and avoid further losses.
